Of two worlds

With intense secrecy, cover ups, rumours, stories, and strange disappearances surrounding Area 51, it is the most frequent subject for conspiracy theorists. The police, secret military, and the government have failed to keep the site hidden from the public. Psi-vampyrs and Dragons form a formidable alliance, and the future collides with the present in an unexpected chain of events. The tables keep on twisting and turning. Our unlikely group of companions try to put a stop to this threat to humanity before it’s too late as something big is about to take place… A book full of misdirection that will leave you thinking.
